item.title: Getting Started
item.description:
Requirements Git Docker >= 1.12 Installation Choose the setup the best suits your needs. A) Setup for Single Project A.1) Already have a PHP project A.2) Don’t have a PHP project yet B) Setup for Multiple Projects A) Setup for Single Project (Follow these steps if you want a separate Docker environment for each project)
A.1) Already have a PHP project: 1 - Clone laradock on your project root directory:
